definition: to pick/to pluck/to collect/to select/to choose/to gather
color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]

sentences.english: The paper compares the economical efficiency of the VRV heat pump air condition system to the traditional heating systems.
sentences.chinese: 对VRV热泵空调系统采暖的经济性进行了分析比较。

sentences.english: However the market economy system has brought about a strong dash to the heating supply of the cogeneration.
sentences.chinese: 市场经济体制带给热电联产向采暖供热以猛烈冲击。

sentences.english: However if you want you can also opt for a floor heating system.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果你想你还可以选择地板采暖系统。

sentences.english: Vehicle oil heater is one of the main equipments for heating bus in winter.
sentences.chinese: 汽车燃油加热器是冬季客车采暖的主要设备之一。

sentences.english: The move will reduce Beijing's pollutant emissions in the heating season by over 10000 tons annually.
sentences.chinese: 此项措施将使北京采暖季可减排污染物上万吨。

sentences.english: Additionally, cabinet backings were pre-finished to prevent off-gassing and the heating, ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC) system was upgraded with improved air filters.
sentences.chinese: 此外，采暖，通风和空调系统的升级与改进也已完毕。

sentences.english: The floor characteristics of heating radiant are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 通过地热试验，分析了地板采暖的性能特性。

sentences.english: This system is designed to control the electric heating.
sentences.chinese: 本系统是为电采暖散热器控制而设计的。

sentences.english: The model of heat transfer in radiant floor heating room is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了地板辐射采暖房间的传热模型。

sentences.english: Research on filtration of extraction technics of Salvia miltiorrhiza Bge. using golden section method;
sentences.chinese: 介绍了黄金分割法在制冷与采暖中的部分应用实例。

sentences.english: Premier Wen Jiabao stresses food, heating supply in cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 温家宝呼吁在冷冬季节应确保食物和采暖供应。

sentences.english: Or, at least, to buy another roll of duct tape.
sentences.chinese: 或者，至少，可以再买一圈采暖通风管。

sentences.english: Floor heating system is one of the most suitable modes for household heat allocating.
sentences.chinese: 地板采暖是最适于分户热计量的采暖方式之一。

sentences.english: Floor heating system is one of the most suitable modes for household heat allocating.
sentences.chinese: 地板采暖是最适于分户热计量的采暖方式之一。

sentences.english: Radiant floor heating is a newly-developed type of heating technology which is comfortable and energy-saving.
sentences.chinese: 地板辐射采暖是一种舒适，节能的新型采暖方式。

sentences.english: Radiant floor heating is a newly-developed type of heating technology which is comfortable and energy-saving.
sentences.chinese: 地板辐射采暖是一种舒适，节能的新型采暖方式。

definition: to warm oneself (by a fire etc)
fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
